header.title: Racist pensioner tells Sainsbury’s security guard ‘you don’t belong here’
header.postText: A pensioner launched a racist tirade against a Sainsbury’s security guard and told him: ‘You don’t belong here’.', 'The abuse was filmed by another customer at the Sainsbury’s Local on Woolwich Road in London and the man can be heard in the footage yelling: ‘What are you f***ing doing here?’', 'He continues: ‘You’re telling me what to do. I belong here. You don’t. F*** off.’', 'Several members of staff at the shop, between Greenwich and Woolwich, along with the security team involved were left in shock by the man’s comments.', 'The targeted security guard remains calm throughout the abuse.', 'When one man intervened, the pensioner added: ‘He’s telling me what to do.', '‘You heard what I said. I belong here. I’m trying to get served. It’s got nothing to do with you.’', 'The woman filming the video then adds: ‘The man is doing his job, it’s not about where he comes from.', '‘Do not start on me because I was born here. There’s kids in this shop, who wants to serve you?', '‘Damn cheek. Do not serve him, this is out of order.’', 'Staff refused to serve the man and escorted him out of the shop.', 'He then screamed: ‘F*** you, fuck this shop, f*** the lot of you.’', 'He added as he left: ‘This is why this f***ing country is in the state it’s in.’', 'The woman filming then tells the staff: ‘Well done, guys.’', 'Miranda Slade, who lives up the road from the shop, said the woman showed her and staff the footage on Saturday.', 'Miranda told Metro.co.uk: ‘The lady said that she wanted it on camera as she believed the man was going to physically attack the staff and she was also worried that he would be backed up by people committing an acid attack.', '‘But I’m not sure if this is something the man threatened, or just what she feared.', '‘The staff told me that the gentleman in the video is actually a well-known regular, who is normally very pleasant to the staff, however on this Friday evening he came in drunk and aggressive.’', 'She said she believes the video was filmed on Friday evening.', 'A Sainsbury’s spokeswoman said they are ‘aware’ of the video.
header.socioLingVar: Ethnicity - General,Age - Over 65s,Nationality - European or anti-Europeans,Behavioural Addiction - Alcohol,Ethnicity - Black,Age - Youngsters,Physical Identity - Physical (and Mental) Impairments,Gender - General, Ideological and Political Identity - General,Ethnicity - White
